snippet: Eight N.H.L. players, including Henrik Lundqvist of the Rangers, will take part in a public-service message aimed at opening doors for gay athletes in sports.
abstract: Eight N.H.L. players, including Henrik Lundqvist of the Rangers, will take part in a public-service message aimed at opening doors for gay athletes in sports.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Taking a Stand to Change Locker Room Culture
headline.print_headline: Taking a Stand to Change Locker Room Culture
